description: The rental and cleaning of Work Pants, Coveralls, and Fire resistant Shirts with Pants containing silica dust on a weekly basis including, lockers, laundry bags, all associated maintenance and services.
duration_in_months: I writed out only while forming output related additional we proposed details checks
full_summary:
### Tradesmen Clothing Rental
#### Location d’habillement des gens de métier
**Reference Number:** cb-371-89108990
**Amendment Number:** 3
**Solicitation Number:** 10077196

**Notice Information**
The Departmental Acquisition Services is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the rental of Trade Dress and the cleaning of the works:

* Work Pants
* Coveralls
* Fire resistant Shirts with Pants

**Contract Details**

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Procurement Category:** Services
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**Proposal Guidelines**
Proposal should include a detailed pricing structure and descriptions of the rental services to be provided, including:

* Location and collection of work clothes
* Cleaning and maintenance of uniforms
* Provision of Lockers and laundry bags
* Acccepts IM/IT bid submission tools only

**Contract Timeline**

* **Notice Date:** 2024-01-25
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-02-19 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-04-01
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-03-31

**Contractor Contact Information**

Should you require more information or clarification about this proposal please contact:

Nicolas Mercier

nicolas.mercier@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca
(343) 550-1641

Should you wish to submit a proposal, you may download the RFP document from:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30404/10077196-tradesmen-clothing-rental-rfp-en.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30404/10077196-location-dhabillement-des-gens-de-metier-ddp-fr.pdf
